useCase.name: Language Selection
useCase.description: User selects a language for interacting with the system.

preconditions.precondition: The user initiates a call to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: User successfully confirms the selected language.

useCase.trigger: User starts the call and the system prompts for language selection.

mainSequence.step: System greets the user and prompts for language selection
User selects a language (1 for English, 2 for French, 3 for local languages)
